attributes.action: Create a social insurance Scheme to support people as they get old with care.
attributes.additional_details: This would allow people to save and pass property etc to relatives when they pass as well as boost NHS funding at the same time as boosting care sector funding.
attributes.background: releasing National Insurance to solely support the NHS and keep social care separate both funded by working people

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure if you want the Government to create a new scheme to support the NHS and social care, and if so how you want this to work, or if you just want the Government to increase funding for the NHS and social care, and if so my how much.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
